headline: Retirees Take Note: The Consumer Staples ETF Hiding Some of the Market’s Strongest Dividend Growers
summary: Consumer staples stocks generate reliable income, hold up during downturns, and tend to raise dividends even when growth slows. The iShares Global Consumer Staples ETF (NYSEARCA:KXI) packages that defensive logic into a single fund, holding 100+ global consumer staples companies with a 0.39% expense ratio and a 2.27% dividend yield. The fund has returned 13.57% ... Retirees Take Note: The Consumer Staples ETF Hiding Some of the Market’s Strongest Dividend Growers

headline: There Is A Hidden Currency Risk Inside KXI That Most Investors Never See Coming
summary: KXI has quietly become one of the better-performing corners of the equity market in 2026. iShares Global Consumer Staples ETF (NYSEARCA:KXI) is up nearly 14% year-to-date, with the past month alone adding roughly 9% as investors rotated toward defensive names while the VIX climbed more than 30% in a single month — a classic flight-to-safety ... There Is A Hidden Currency Risk Inside KXI That Most Investors Never See Coming

headline: PepsiCo vs. Coca-Cola: Which Beverage Giant Wins the Cola War?
summary: PEP and KO showcase contrasting models, diversified snacks and drinks versus pure-play beverages, while trading at different valuation multiples.

headline: As Demand for Human Connection Increases, RWS Global Chooses Box to Power AI-Ready Content for Live Experiences
summary: LONDON, February 25, 2026--RWS Global, the world leader in groundbreaking live moments across entertainment and sports, today announced it has selected Box, Inc. (NYSE: BOX) as its Intelligent Content Management (ICM) partner to help fuel AI-driven content in the company’s experiential ecosystem.

headline: The Coca-Cola Company Announces Participation in Citi 2026 Global Consumer & Retail Conference
summary: ATLANTA, February 25, 2026--The Coca-Cola Company announced today that John Murphy, President and Chief Financial Officer, will present at the Citi 2026 Global Consumer & Retail Conference March 9 at 8 a.m. ET.

headline: KXI Is Anchored by Dividend Kings That Quietly Returned 18% This Year
summary: KXI pays a 2.2% dividend yield by owning shares in the world’s most recognizable consumer staples companies, passing that income through to investors each quarter. With nearly 20 years of operating history and a portfolio built around household names, it has earned a reputation as a conservative income vehicle for retirees. But a 2.2% yield ... headline: Fomento Economico: Q4 Earnings Snapshot
summary: MONTERREY N.L., Mexico (AP) — Fomento Economico Mexicano SAB (FMX) on Wednesday reported net income of $444.6 million in its fourth quarter. On a per-share basis, the Monterrey N.l. Mexico-based company said it had net income of $1.28.

raw.headline: Fomento Economico: Q4 Earnings Snapshot
raw.summary: MONTERREY N.L., Mexico (AP) — Fomento Economico Mexicano SAB (FMX) on Wednesday reported net income of $444.6 million in its fourth quarter. On a per-share basis, the Monterrey N.l. Mexico-based company said it had net income of $1.28.

headline: Coca-Cola Resets Hydration Brands As New CEO Team Takes Shape
summary: Coca-Cola (NYSE:KO) is temporarily halting U.S. availability of Topo Chico mineral water while it upgrades production facilities. BodyArmor, a Coca-Cola brand, has been named the official sports drink of NCAA March Madness and plans to launch a new product that could affect the sports hydration category. Henrique Braun is preparing to step into the CEO role at Coca-Cola, alongside the appointment of a new vice president of investor relations. Coca-Cola (NYSE:KO) earns most of its revenue...
